    • Method Detail

      • writer

        public static WriterBody writer()
        Retrieves the textual output body format.
        Returns:
        the singleton textual output body format instance

      • set

        public <M extends Message<M>> M set(M message,
                                    Consumer<Supplier<Writer>> value)
        Configures a message to hold a textual output body.

        Configures the raw binary output body of message to write the textual message body to the accepted output stream using the character encoding specified in its Content-Type header or the default charset if none is specified.

        Sets the Content-Type header of message to MIME, if not already set.

        Specified by:
        set in interface Body<Consumer<Supplier<Writer>>>
        Type Parameters:
        M - the type of message
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be configured to hold a structured body managed by this body format
        value - the structured body being configured for message by this message body format
        Returns:
        the configured message
